website_summaries.verdict: The few quirks that are possible with this crossbow don't detract from its overall durability, performance, and value. Great for beginners as well as avid hunters watching their budgets.
pros: This packages includes arrows, a sling, quiver, scope, rope cocker, wax, and an affordable crossbow that is surprisingly well-made and accurate for the budget-friendly price
cons: Instructions are confusing and difficult to follow
Scope is a bit challenging to adjust

customer_reviews.title: weight and fitment are great..
customer_reviews.text: finish and components are top notch..quality workmanship and assembly...balance,weight and fitment are great...i like the adjustable and interchangeable feature for the 6 hole butt stock and the hand grip...those items are easily and inexpensively bought from other sites...the frame,trigger group and sights are BEAR items...about the only option not easily changed is the quiver mount from crosswise on the riser to parallel to the stock..(.minor detail)...scope is adequate enough for crossbow/hunting ranges...the sling included is basic and utilitarian...i dont think most people carry their crossbow very far...there are streamlined guards along the rail body to protect/remind the shooter of the danger zone from the string/prod ..i own 2 of these bows...value cannot be surpassed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than my $1500 crossbow
customer_reviews.text: I got this crossbow for my son based on specs and price. I wasn't sure how it was going to turn out but this thing is awesome. It shoots better than my predator. I'm actually trying to sell that now and going to get another one of these. Out of the box took 10 minutes to put together and was shooting dead on out to 50 yards in a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Baker

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS. IMPORTANT FOR SETUP
customer_reviews.text: Scope does not adjust high enough to shoot a consistent shot. So you ruin your bolts it comes with right away and have to buy new ones next day. Going to have to put a shim under rear of scope. Not happy that I have to buy new bolts after less than 24 hours. Did about 50 clicks and never got it high enough. Will have to get shim fabiricate it myself to get to shoot right, or buy different scope rings, and need new bolts now because fletchings were destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Dgriffo

customer_reviews.title: Well made crossbow for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Got the crossbow when expected and in good shape. I did a lot of research on this crossbow and it performed and is well built, like the short axle to axle specially when it is cocked. I would recommend this crossbow to anyone especially for the price. This is my first ever crossbow, i have been just a bow guy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a friend who paid 600 for his big-time bow and he said this bow was better than his. Actually was shooting through the targets we were using. This is a STEAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goodpaster

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding piece of equipment. I was able to zero it and harvest 3 whitetail deer this past season in roughly 15days. First time archery hunting, no mentor to advise me on tips and tricks to archery hunting. The buck (11 point) that I harvested this past season was at 80+ yards. Was a clean fast harvest. First archery hunt and first time deer hunting. 7/5/20 I'm currently wondering why when I first bought this crossbow the description said it was 410fps and 110lb draw. Now looking at the description its completely different. Still a good crossbow, but I probably would have gone a different route if it wasn't for the description.
customer_reviews.author: cheese90250

customer_reviews.title: Full price for an open box item
customer_reviews.text: Payed $301 after tax got it in the mail today and I’m just hoping there’s nothing missing or wrong with it disappointed I payed for a brand new product that’s been opened and returned
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really nice well built bow. Put it together in about ten minutes sighted in in about 8 shots. This bow is much quieter than my quad 400. Adjustable stuck really helps get the eye relief and alignment set to the scope. The bolt hold down is different from most bows uses a spring loaded ball instead of plastics or steal, seams to work really well. Scope is standard for entry level bow but does what you need it too.
customer_reviews.author: John Petersen

customer_reviews.title: 4 days shipping. 7 days to return. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I received my Bear Apocalypse on Friday. The assembly instructions were not clear and it was apparent from the start that this a poorly made crossbow. By Saturday it was still not shooting consistently so I tried to finger tighten the scope bolts and one snapped off. I also found chipped paint in 2 spots. The ar-style shoulder rest rattles as it is carried. The scope is horrible. Poor design. Poor construction. Poor crossbow. As a side note I bought a PSE Fang for my son at the same time. It’s awesome. I’m getting a second one of the instead of this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT & DEAL
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love!!! Has a slight kick but nothing too serious. Comes with all the works but you have to put it together. I got this for my husband and purchased extras like a carry bag, over the shoulder quiver, etc. MAKE SURE YOU LINE THE COCKING ROPE UP JUST RIGHT AND THAT IT DOESN'T SLIP (IT WILL break fingers and split you open). Lol. Be prepared ahead of time and go ahead and purchase an extra COCKING ROPE and plenty of WAX. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N Martin

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews incredible value.
customer_reviews.text: I read alot of reviews before purchasing this. I had a failure with my previous crossbow and needed to upgrade for this years hunting. Very easy to assemble took about 15 minutes. At the range thinking of the reviews I was prepared for tI'm spent sighting it in. It shot 18 inches low, but centered. Imagine my surprise when I was sighted in perfectly on the 5th bolt down range. I do now believe the reports on accuracy. I won't shoot two bolts at the same spot. You would ruin 1 with it being hit by the other. Nothing I would change at this time.
customer_reviews.author: VolksJon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Luckily my wife took the pamphlet from me when we went to put it together - the stupid paper had all the parts labeled incorrectly, so the instructions made no sense at all. Once she was able to determine things from photos, I was able to get it together and start playing with it. Takes a while to get it sighted properly, but phenomenal device for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better than what the price is .should have cost more
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is awesome. Dont let any bad reviews stop you from buying this . Great quality, easy to assemble, shooting it 30 minutes after delivery. My only problem was I had a cheap target from Wally world and my first bolt went right thru it. Went and bought a descent target and sighted it in in 3 shots. Get a good target and you won't be buying bolts . The scope is really great for what you buying.and it came with a cool sticker for my truck window.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Crossbow good, scope trash!
customer_reviews.text: The crossbow itself is great. The scope is trash. No Matter how much I adjust it all my shots are between 1 to 2 inches to the right of my mark. So I had my wife try it (22 years in the military qualified her to 2nd check) all of her shots were the same no matter how much we adjusted the scope.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.ROYALTY

customer_reviews.title: rough initial role out
customer_reviews.text: String broke FIRST shot, weather it was age or a defect in the string, I don't know. bought a new one, put it on myself and was back up firing the next day. shoots well (pretty consistent). Had great luck with bear archery in the passed, just write this one up as a hiccup. And yes I do fully intend to keep buying there products!!!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Deadly Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I thought all the 5 star reviews sounded a little too good but after shooting my Karnage Apocalypse I am adding another one. This thing is scary accurate right out the box, it took me 4 shots to zero the scope and I was shooting 1inch groups at 40 yards. Having never shot a crossbow before I'm about as happy as could be with the results. My only complaint was the seller shipped it USPS so it was like waiting for Christmas after it shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This is my first crossbow and it got the job done. Took a buck with it at 25 yards and he turned and dropped. I am confident with shots out to 40 yards, but did not practice at further distances. It has power and punches through a Block Vault target with the fletching on one side and the broadhead on the other. The adjustable stock is a nice feature to make it fit all users comfortably. I would recommend to anyone looking for a reasonably priced crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: RF Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for less than $300
customer_reviews.text: The karnage apocalypse by Bear is a great bow capable of taking large game like elk. Shoots right through flesh and bones 👌I equipped mine with the 1.5-5x32 VXR sightmark core crossbow scope and it was so worth it the stock scope is boop boop. Bought a boresighter and had it sighted in less than 5 mins. First bow ive ever purchased and am very happy with it and looking forward to whitetail season. The crossbow is very hard to pull back possible with hand but I couldn't even cock it with the cocking rope when it arrived I'm 18 120 pounds 6'2 and struggled for a few days to pull it back. Overall tho I'd say im apocalypse ready
customer_reviews.author: Henry, no

customer_reviews.title: Kind hard to cock
customer_reviews.text: Very fast will shoot though a 250 pound hog 30 yards and comes whit 3 really good arrows and scope like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good budget starter bow
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for a budget crossbow. This is my first crossbow so I dont have much to go off of but the accuracy beyond 30 yards is not what I expected. The best groups I can get at 40 yards are about 8 inches, I wont shoot it beyond that and wouldn't shoot a deer further than 30 yards. Maybe a scope upgrade would help. Also it is very loud. It is very fast though and the adjustable stock is the best feature, my 12 year old can shoot it just fine. Again not too bad for under $200
customer_reviews.author: DSN

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Bear Archery was easy to contact and quickly responded to a small issue I had unrelated to the crossbow itself. The crossbow seems to be a great value for the money and the company selling it obvioulsy stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Major Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Right side bow arm splintered first day and a friend’s did the same thing
customer_reviews.text: 2nd crossbow replacement, same issue arm broke after having it just over a month. Manufacture replace bow with newer year and upgraded model Day one, no arrows shot, first pull back on the bow strings and it broke. Waiting for a replacement and will revisit this review..... not happy! At lest it didn’t happen during the season. Same thing happen to a friend’s same crossbow except he got a few uses out of his
customer_reviews.author: Ron Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Complete Set
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband and he absolutely loves it. Best part is that it comes with everything you need, there's no going to the store and trying to find all the things that will go best with it and piece it together.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bow
customer_reviews.text: Great Bow! So easy to shoot, I did not expect this great quality for the low price. Scope is nice and bright, dialed it in and holds 0 nicely
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to test the actual function of the product, it does appear to be great quality and I am very please with the product itself. However the assembly process for someone unfamiliar with crossbows is extremely difficult. The main reason being is the directions are almost useless. The assembly instructions are very vague and the pictures are very hard to distinguish, because they used a different crossbow for the example. That being said the part numbers do not match the actual parts. Assembly is much over complicated, but overall it is still worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Devenn

customer_reviews.title: Snapped limb
customer_reviews.text: Terrible crossbow, cocking rope snapped on me 4 bolts in and after 7 bolts the limb of the crossbow snapped on me, I'm very displeased with the quality and extremely unhappy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Countrystrong

customer_reviews.title: Complete package, great value for the money. Get some broad heads and you are ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow was better than expected. I liked that it came with everything I needed to get started except the broad heads. I am a senior archery hunter and over the years have developed shoulder problems and was unable to pull and hold my compound bow. This was the perfect solution. I am able to enjoy the archery season and shoot with accuracy and confidence. Zeroed in with 4 shots at 20 yds. Totally surprised at the accuracy of this bow. Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this crossbow. Amazing product for price. But on Heavy side it price definitely out ways that.
customer_reviews.author: Chad, Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: Sweet crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crossbow, sighted in fairly quick with different arrows, the ones that come with it are garbage. Took 10 mins to assemble. Gonna see if I can drop a deer with it in about 2 weeks. Wasnt sure if quiver was removable and it is. My wife likes shooting it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod Voss

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of crossbow for the price. Lots of extras thrown in on the deal for free.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bitchin

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beast!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up. Zeroed in the scope in no time using $28 a dozen bolts I bought off of Amazon. Shoots so hard I’m going to have to get a new shooting block. Plan on hunting with it tomorrow. Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what pictures show can't wait to go hunting with it
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bow but scope is lacking
customer_reviews.text: The bow shoots fast, relatively quiet, and solid. The scope would not zero in. It reached a point to where no matter how many clicks I made, there was no adjustment. I placed my old 4x32 scope from my old crossbow on it and had it hitting the bulls eye on the 4th shot. Love the bow! Threw the scope in the trash though.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Limbs snapped very early!
customer_reviews.text: Deadly accurate with a Tru glo 4x32 scope. Fired approximately 50 shots and then heard the dreaded crack. Limbs snapped. Called Bear, said they would take care of it, their customer service is great. I've had Barnett's for years and never had this happen so soon. Going back to Barnett, wouldn't purchase another Bear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, could put a second one together in half the time...haha Shoots well and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Top quality at a very reasonable price! You won't go wrong to buy this model.
customer_reviews.text: I can consistently hit the bulls eye from 120 ft. she's fast and powerful. Exceptionally sturdy and durable. anyone who wrote a negative review did so as a result of their own ignorance and incompetence. I'll never need a "better" one.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Crosbow is nice scope is junk
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to assemble, the crossbow is awesome. I don't like the scope no matter how many times I try to get it to zero in on bullseye it won't dial in I've shot it at least 50+ times at 20 yards using a rest it's always low and left, got it close as I could then when I changed from field point to broadhead it started shooting 8 inches high. I'm using 100 grain field points and 100 grain broad heads.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bow quit looking at others
customer_reviews.text: Throw the scope away and be sure to always de cock the arrow no longer than 8 hours I had mine break. But this thing will split arrows if you shoot a few times on a bench. The scope was great til the bow fell a few inches now it want hold. I'd absolutely buy this again !
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good bow
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this bow!!! He was so excited when he got this!! One down fall is the scope that it comes with isn't very good. He wound up getting a red dot but other then its great!! 4 stars ☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH D.

customer_reviews.title: Great introductory crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: As far as quality, it's almost identical to a Centerpoint 370. Assembly, materials used, power. Its almost a clone. That being said, for the price, it's a great deal. The scope isnt the best, but what would you expect for an entire package that costs less than $300? I was able to zero it in though, and was shooting nickel sized groups from 20 yards out. Definitely powerful enough for hunting. Only time will tell how it holds up. If it ends up breaking on me, I'll update my review. For now, I absolutely recommend it, especially for someone just looking to get started.
customer_reviews.author: nsparks

customer_reviews.title: Bo is very fast but the scope does not work
customer_reviews.text: Yes I like the bow but the scope does not work need to get ahold of the company and see if they'll replace the scope on it because it will not turn to set the sights
customer_reviews.author: James Trullinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. 50 something crossbows used, this is the first I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Boggs

customer_reviews.title: sweet crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Nice Crossbow, with all the latest features great for a start up crossbow that won't break the bank
customer_reviews.author: SPT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bow
customer_reviews.text: Love the bow just received today 4 shots to zero scope the first pic 50 yrds second 30 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Steven weber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: View looks and functions great but is slow. I rather use my compound.
customer_reviews.author: John Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: When you ship things like this cover them So that people cannot see the picture on the Box of once sitting on your porch
customer_reviews.author: Adamb

customer_reviews.title: Great Bow for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product was Very easy to put together. Even for someone who has never owned a crossbow before. Bolts could definitely be upgraded. But the actual bow itself is a great option, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kaylee vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the scope had to be shimmed. That's the only problem it has, super accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tankbull

customer_reviews.title: Once I zeroed it my shot group was so tight I damaged two bolts with a third shot!!
customer_reviews.text: Blazing fast! Extremely accurate!! Hats off to Bear archery for manufacturing a crossbow like this and selling it at a low pricepoint!!!
customer_reviews.author: mark akeley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: His thing works really well I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Buntjer

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY BADASS
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I’d hunt whitetail deer with a crossbow after pursuing them for over 45 years with a muzzleloader. This crossbow is outstanding even for an old codger like me. I’m retiring the muzzleloader. Easy to put together, easy to sight in, triggers not great, but overall a great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Celdum inn

customer_reviews.title: Love this crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product from Bear Archery! It's affordable and shoots like the much more expensive crossbows! I would certainly recommend this to any hunter....
customer_reviews.author: joseph pike

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This item was a scam no crossbow at all I received a random item instead.
customer_reviews.author: Vampirelordx2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This bow is fast and dead accurate. Shoots better the my buddies 1500.00 reverse limb. I liked mine so much I ordered my son the same 1.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: Nice bow. I'm a beginner but this seems super accurate and reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Slovenski

customer_reviews.title: Great Crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is the same as other reviews. The scope shoots low!! I found a fix for it though. I cant wait to hunt with it.
customer_reviews.author: cmac

customer_reviews.title: awesome bow! wobbly shoulder plate.
customer_reviews.text: full kit, ready to kill. extremely powerful. The shoulder butt plate is a bit wobbly and rattles. You will want to add some muffling on it to avoid spooking game. This is an area that deserves an upgrade in next model design.
customer_reviews.author: John in Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Received item 1week early was very easy to put together haven’t shot it yet but looks to be well built and easy instructions to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not cock easily
customer_reviews.text: Crossbow is powerful. Shoots well. The biggest disappointment is cooking the bow. Myself and my dad both had trouble with the cocking rope getting hung up on the silencer below the scope. Making it very dangerous to release.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This bow is absolutely a steal would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kentuckypride

customer_reviews.title: Super accurate crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: Great crossbow for its value. You won’t be disappointed. I plan on getting one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Scope was trash out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The scope would not sight in using adjustment knobs and something fell apart internally and now you can't see through it currently trying to figure out who to contact about replacement scope
customer_reviews.author: Adam Garver

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: it finally arrived. its very late but worth the wait! i was impressed by its power. the best crossbow for beginners like me.
customer_reviews.author: marvin b.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best crossbow I have ever shot and hunted with. Would def buy another one .... Will recommend this crossbow to others.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, groupings were tight and had no issue adjusting the scope (as some other users had reported). 1-inch groups easily at ~35 yards consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Scope warranty?
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure what kind of warranty the scope had on this crossbow. It has what appears to be moisture in it. Not very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , and put together once you daily on the scope it on target
customer_reviews.author: joe reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable nice crossbow for price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for $300, had to adjust my scope rail up just a hair otherwise nice crossbow for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Besser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the bow great set up it’s fast and accurate. Great price for a great bow.
customer_reviews.author: brian luken

customer_reviews.title: Scope was a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Scope was a piece of junk . After spending another &100 on a quality scope I was able to shoot quarter size groups at 20 yards
customer_reviews.author: charles brush

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow is a beast, it’s very fast and accurate. Only took maybe 5-7 shots to get it sighted in and hitting dead center in the bullseye at 20 and 30 yards. The only problem I’ve had with it is the foot stirrup, after 3 or 4 times of shooting the bow the screws loosen up and the stirrup nearly falls off and has to be tightened back up. Besides that this thing is a complete beast and I highly recommend it to anyone that’s looking for a good crossbow for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gevedon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome crossbow easy to use can not wait to take it hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V Johnson

product_meta.title: Karnage Apocalypse Crossbow Package Includes Arrows, Quiver, Detachable Sling, Wax, Cocking Rope, and Scope
product_meta.description: Do more than survive. The Karnage Apocalypse deliveries top of the line speed, accuracy and quality for an affordable price. They are forged with the hunter in mind making them sleek and lethal. This crossbow offers aggressive power and performance under the most challenging of conditions on any continent. Stock has 3" of adjustability with and adjustable cheek piece, ambidextrous trigger with dry fire inhibitor, adjustable fore end grip is mounted on a picatanny-style rail system for improved accuracy and comfort, dual mount string recoil suppressor system to reduce noise and friction.
feature_bullets: Compound crossbow with blazing speeds up to 370 feet per second
Narrow axle to axle at full draw only 14 inches wide, 18 inches wide not at full draw
Comes with 3 K20 carbon bolts, quiver, detachable sling, rail lube/string wax, and cocking rope
Features draw weight of 175 lbs., kinetic energy of 111 ft/lbs., and weighs only 7.5 lbs.
Includes 4x32 scope multi cross reticle with focusing eye piece

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
